column1: '''Henry G. Howie''' ([[June]] [[1959]]) was one of the designers of the video game [[Riders of Rohan (video game)|Riders of Rohan]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/riders.html Riders of Rohan] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 4 January 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=6 Meristation
column2: El Anillo interactivo] p. 7 (retrieved 4 January 2011)</ref> He is currently president of [http://www.bluefang.com/principals.html Blue Fang Games].
